api.description: Api server config related: port, host, etc

app.description: App runtime config: behaviour of pipeline and log

connections.description: connections to databases: Eg: Postgres, Snowflake, etc

sources.description: sources to ingest data related to particular connection

sql.description: transformations to apply to source data in SQL format as multiple queries

api_security.description: The security configuration for the API; Default: None

volume_size.description: The size of the volume in GB

ApiSecurity.description: The security model option for the API

data_storage.description: The storage to use for the log.

error_threshold.description: How many errors we can tolerate before bringing down the app.

max_interval_before_persist_in_seconds.description: The maximum time in seconds before a new checkpoint is created. If there're no new records, no checkpoint will be created.

max_num_records_before_persist.description: The maximum unpersisted number of records in the processor record store. A checkpoint will be created when this number is reached.

persist_queue_capacity.description: Maximum number of pending persisting requests.

record_store.description: The record store to use for the processors.

in_aggregations.description: enable probabilistic optimizations in aggregations (SUM, COUNT, MIN, etc.); Default: false

in_joins.description: enable probabilistic optimizations in JOIN operations; Default: false

in_sets.description: enable probabilistic optimizations in set operations (UNION, EXCEPT, INTERSECT); Default: false

table_name.description: name of the table in source database; Type: String

authenticate_server_reflection.description: require authentication to access grpc server reflection service if true.; Default: false

enable_app_checkpoints.description: app checkpoints can be used to resume execution of a query.; Default: false

enable_probabilistic_optimizations.description: probablistic optimizations reduce memory consumption at the expense of accuracy.

grpc_web.description: http1 + web support for grpc. This is required for browser clients.; Default: true

pdb.description: Only needed if using pluggable database

schemas.description: The schemas to consider when listing tables. If empty, will list all schemas, which can be slow.

database.description: The database to connect to (default: postgres)

host.description: The host to connect to (IP or DNS name)

password.description: The password to use for authentication

sslmode.description: The sslmode to use for the connection (disable, prefer, require)

user.description: The username to use for authentication

columns.description: list of columns gonna be used in the source table; Type: String[]

connection.description: reference to pre-defined connection name; Type: String

name.description: name of the source - to distinguish between multiple sources; Type: String

refresh_config.description: setting for how to refresh the data; Default: RealTime

schema.description: name of schema source database; Type: String

table_name.description: name of the table in source database; Type: String

config.description: setting for what type of udf to use; Default: Onnx
